```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Load Files
```{r}
data2015<-read_csv("output/2015/2015_dima_lpi_cover_all_reshape.csv")
data2016<-read_csv("output/2016/2016_dima_lpi_cover_all_reshape.csv")
data2017dry<-read_csv("output/2017/dry_creek/2017_dima_lpi_cover_all_dry_reshape.csv")
data2017dov<-read_csv("output/2017/dove_creek/2017_dima_lpi_cover_all_dov_reshape.csv")
```

```{r}
data2015
data2016
data2017dry
data2017dov
```

##Merge All dAtasets
```{r}
merged<-bind_rows(data2016, data2017dry, data2017dov)
merged<-merged%>%replace( is.na(.), 0)
merged
```




##Write For GIS
```{r}
write_csv(merged, "output/all/lpi_cover_all.csv")
```
